Comments.Message: Looks like an upgrade of .NET from 3.0 to 3.5 has fixed the issue.  Maybe make it clearer somewhere when you d/l rawr that you need the latest .NET?
I have .Net 3.5 on my machine and still get this error. Did you install any service packs?
